front.title: Threat Model for Networks Employing AAA Proxies

abstract.t: This memo defines a threat model for access networks with AAA proxies. Use cases of current and future applications in which AAA proxies are employed are described and it is discussed how proxies could launch attacks in the defined use cases. The risk associated with these attacks in each use case is analyzed. As a result, this draft can serve as a guideline for risk assessments by providers, implementers and protocol designers of systems with proxies.
